sentences.en: " Auntie told me not to run, " he explained, " on account of my asthma. ”
sentences.cn: “ 阿姨叫我不要跑, ” 他解释道, “ 因为我有气喘病. ”

sentences.en: a severe asthma attack
sentences.cn: 哮喘严重发作

sentences.en: Allergy to cats is one of the commonest causes of asthma.
sentences.cn: 对猫类过敏是哮喘病发作最常见的诱因之一。

sentences.en: Another aspect of this problem is control of asthma among children in these populations.
sentences.cn: 这个问题的另一个方面是在这些群体的儿童中控制哮喘。

sentences.en: Any illness of the lungs or throat , such as asthma or a cough.
sentences.cn: 消耗病，痨病肺部或喉咙的任何一种病变，如哮喘或咳嗽。

sentences.en: Asthma causes wheezing and breathlessness.
sentences.cn: 哮喘会造成气喘和呼吸困难。

sentences.en: Asthma drugs are not addictive and you don't need to keep increasing the dose. If anything, the reverse is true.
sentences.cn: 哮喘药物不会造成药物依赖，你不用持续增大剂量。甚至正相反，减小剂量才对。

sentences.en: Compensation is available for people who have developed asthma as a direct result of their work.
sentences.cn: 直接因工作原因患上哮喘的人会获得赔偿。

sentences.en: Frequently sufferers of this kind of allergy are also sufferers of asthma.
sentences.cn: 患有这种过敏症的人也经常会患有哮喘病。

sentences.en: I think he's having an asthma attack.
sentences.cn: 我想他现在是哮喘病发作了.

sentences.en: It had brought on an attack of asthma.
sentences.cn: 这引发了哮喘。

sentences.en: It is like diabetes or asthma, an illness, due to a build up of pressures, which can happen to anyone.
sentences.cn: 就像是糖尿病或者哮喘，由于压力的形成，这种病有可能发生在任何人身上。

sentences.en: It scares me sometimes because I do have asthma and when I walk, I do gasp for air.
sentences.cn: 她说：“我会担心体重，因为我有哮喘，我走路的时候总是气喘吁吁。

sentences.en: Most people do not have to be hospitalized for asthma or pneumonia.
sentences.cn: 大多数哮喘或肺炎患者无需住院。

sentences.en: Pollution can aggravate asthma.
sentences.cn: 污染会使气喘加重。

sentences.en: She suffers from bronchial asthma.
sentences.cn: 她患有支气管哮喘。

sentences.en: The drug is set to become the treatment of choice for asthma worldwide.
sentences.cn: 这种药将会成为全世界治疗哮喘的首选。

sentences.en: The sessions will enable you to discuss problems with fellow asthma sufferers.
sentences.cn: 这些环节让你和其他哮喘病患者一起讨论问题.

sentences.en: This drug is contraindicated in patients with asthma.
sentences.cn: 这种药哮喘病人禁用。

sentences.en: We have only asthma.
sentences.cn: 我们只有哮喘。
